---

## How to Update This Tracker

When starting work on an issue:
1. Change status from ğŸ”´ to ğŸŸ¡
2. Mark specification phase as started

During implementation:
1. Update specification status to âœ… when complete
2. Update implementation status as you progress

After completion:
1. Change status to ğŸŸ¢
2. Mark all phases as âœ…
3. Update progress summary percentages
